Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of Santa Clara
Private Litigation Case Title: Diller V. Under Armour Retail, Inc., et al

Description: The Securities and Exchange Commission charged sports apparel manufacturer Under Armour Inc. with misleading investors as to the bases of its revenue growth and failing to disclose known uncertainties concerning its future revenue prospects. Under Armour agreed to pay $9 million to settle the action.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
